Systematic mediastinal lymph node sampling was performed at the following stations:

Station 2R: Id[REDACTED] hypoechoic lymph node measuring 14.8mm (short axis) x 16.0mm (long axis). 4 passes performed with 22G needle. ROSE: Suspicious for malignancy.
Station 2L: Id[REDACTED] homogeneous lymph node measuring 15.4mm (short axis) x 34.5mm (long axis). 2 passes performed with 22G needle. ROSE: Granuloma.
Station 10L: Id[REDACTED] homogeneous lymph node measuring 10.7mm (short axis) x 16.3mm (long axis). 3 passes performed with 22G needle. ROSE: Malignant - adenocarcinoma.

PART 2: ROBOTIC BRONCHOSCOPY FOR PERIPHERAL LESION

Following completion of mediastinal staging, the Monarch robotic bronchoscopy system was deployed.

Target lesion: LUL inferior lingula (B5)
